attributes.value: Does not respect the law
Values independence
Finds introspection to be a waste of time
Values self-control
Prefers a noisy, bustling life to boring days without activity
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Really respects those that take the time to master a skill
Sees competition as wasteful and silly
Finds nature somewhat disturbing
Almost never feels discouraged
Is very slow to anger
Is a vulgar being who does not care a lick for even the most basic rules of civilized living
Takes no pleasure in her talents and appearance
Is incurious and never seeks out knowledge or information to satisfy herself
Easily changes her mind and will generally go with the prevailing view on anything
Dislikes helping others
Hates vows, obligations, promises and other binding elements that could restrict her
Would never under any circumstances speak up or otherwise put forth her point of view in a discussion
Is not readily moved by art or natural beauty
Poor analytical abilities
An iffy sense for music
